patthana24.20:4.1: Naaraṇaṃ naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.20:6.1: Naaraṇaṃ nasaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.20:7.1: Naaraṇaṃ naganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.20:9.1: Naaraṇaṃ naoghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.20:11.1: Naaraṇaṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.20:13.1: Naaraṇaṃ nanīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.20:15.1: Naaraṇaṃ naparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
